description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nPendulum's Return:
Your {CLASS_Death} creatures and {RACE_Beacon} creatures always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_AGILE}. When an enemy {CLASS_Death} creature would afflict your creatures with a debuff, they afflict them with a buff instead.
name: Desecrator's Lantern
